about_the_game:
Topic introduction:

This is a unique type of game that entered the public eye during many people's childhood, carrying countless memories. Its mechanism is simple, but the process is constantly changing; Its plot is simple, but its worldview evokes infinite imagination

Now, what would be the result if we combined everything that the "Magic Tower" worldview had in that era and expressed them in a complete story? I have always believed that in this worldview, there are countless warriors, while there is only one magic tower. The history of the formation and evolution of the "Magic Tower" is inevitably a combination of the stories of its residents; And the former rulers of the Magic Tower will also become the protagonists in that unforgettable history.

Game plot:

The plot of this work is the story of the traditional magic tower character "Grady" sealing the original owner of the"Magic Tower" and obtaining the tower. The time point of its occurrence is before the "50-layer Magic Tower", and the content is generally the compressed product of the story in the novel "Magic Tower Episode". Due to the needs of the game process, this plot is not completely equivalent to the novel plot.

You will gradually become familiar with this tower, understand its origin and current situation, and uncover a shocking "secret" hidden within it from the perspective of Gr ö lderi during the adventure.

Subsequently, you will defeat the leaders of the tower one by one and seal the true "demon tower owner" to safeguard world peace.

Game materials:

-The characters and blocks in the game are mostly self-made materials based on the style of the RPG Maker MV, with a small portion being original RPG Maker MV materials; The animated images are original RPG Maker MV materials.

-The music for the sound material game is the author's self-made tracks, and most of the sound effects are original RPG Maker MV materials.

All author made materials in the game can be used for the production of the Tongren Magic Tower, but commercial use is prohibited.

Game content:

Most of the game mechanics are consistent with the game type "Magic Tower", and the entire game is divided into two parts: "Main Tower" and "Basement", with a total of 46 maps.

According to the protagonist's ability in storyline, the game add several additional "skills" to help players pass the level.

2 manipulable characters: [Grady] & [Marcia].

When manipulating [Grady], the game has three difficulty modes: Easy, Normal, and Hard. Hard Mode is not available at the beginning, and requires completing the game once.

[Marcia] will be unlocked after completing the game once on any difficulty.

Also, 61 game achievements waiting to be unlockd!

Manipulation list:

Arrow Keys - Move

0 - Show Damage; 1~4 - Select Skills; 9 - Show ATK Crit.

Q - Equipment; W - Skills; E - Options; R - Withdraw

A - Load; S - Save; D - Mattock; F - Warp Wing

G - Wind Compass; Z - Turn; X - Menu

short_description: "The History of Magic Tower: Opening" is a fantasy adventure game based on the "Magic Tower" game mode. This work is set against the backdrop of various traditional magical tower worldviews and tells the story of events that occurred before the time point of the classic game "50-layer Magic Tower".
